summary: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.
cast: Choi Min-sik|Jung-woo Ha|Jin-woong Cho|Dong-seok Ma|Jongsoo Kim|Jong-goo Kim|Tae-won Kwon|Young-chang Song|Yeong-Seon Kim|Peter Cavnoudias|Ju-Seon Eo|Go Gyu-Pil|Cheol-woo Han|Kim Hye-Eun|Han Soo Hyun|Yoo Jae-Myung|Hyun Joong Kang|Sin-cheol Kang|Eung-soo Kim|Hong-pa Kim|Jin-hyeok Kim|Min-Jae Kim|Seong-gyoon Kim|Young-Sun Kim|In-beom Ko|Do-won Kwak|Hyeok-soo Kwon|Nam-hee Kwon|Cheol-min Lee|Hee-joon Lee|Yoon-Hee Lee|In-soo Park|Sang-gyu Park|Byung-wook Son|Kwon Yul|Byeong-eun Park|Jong-bin Yoon
keywords: crime investigation|south korea|gangster|government crackdown on crime|korean gangster
title: Nameless Gangster
